Find the [Google Sheets version here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1YKL4qaIcM70KUY9LssGDrd0aKtEecHlCv1XotF2EJfY).

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(googlesheets4)
gs4_deauth()

ato_url <- 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1YKL4qaIcM70KUY9LssGDrd0aKtEecHlCv1XotF2EJfY/'

sheets <- sheet_names(ato_url)

sheets_data <- lapply(sheets, {
  \(.x) with_gs4_quiet(read_sheet(ato_url, sheet = .x))
})
```
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
for(i in seq_along(sheets)){
  cat('## ', sheets[i], '\n\n', 
    knitr::kable(sheets_data[[i]]), '\n\n',
    sep = "")
}
```
